comments.body:
I wonder if this (and any other instance of `private_key`) should have `no_log=true`

I might have missed this in some other PRs, so feel free to raise one PR that updates all the modules.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +102,106 @@                   choices=['absent', 'present']),
        name=dict(type='str', required=True),
        private_key=dict(type='str',),
        public_key=dict(type='str',),
        tenant_ref=dict(type='str',),
